name: AMGS [Armageddon Space]
description:
Fight waves of aliens on an ever-increasing procedurally generated asteroid while trying to beat the highest score.

# Run the game
java 13.0.2 - run the Jar with the command "java -jar ". Be sure to have installed Java 13 or above to be able to run the game -> https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase-jdk13-downloads.html

# info
This game and game engine was made in 1 month, for INSA Lyon SCAN 2A Computer Science final project.  The code is composed of vanilla Java (no external libraries, no framework) and compiled with java 13.0.2

# team
Onyr / Florian Rascoussier - Lead Dev, Pixel Artist, Sound design, Game design

Martin Mallet - Dev, Documents

Grégoire Claus - Dev, Documents

Background Music -> https://soundcloud.com/0nyr/eons-of-darkness-escape-from-antarctica-onyr-remix
